books.author: by Dan Brown
books.description: The symbologist Robert Langdon, on the run in Florence, must decipher a series of codes created by a Dante-loving scientist.
books.name: INFERNO

books.author: by Sylvia Day
books.description: Eva and Gideon face the demons of their pasts and accept the consequences of their obsessive desires; a Crossfire novel.
books.name: ENTWINED WITH YOU

books.author: by Khaled Hosseini
books.description: A multigenerational family saga centers on a brother and sister born in Afghanistan.
books.name: AND THE MOUNTAINS ECHOED

books.author: by Abbi Glines
books.description: The final book in a trilogy, following "Fallen Too Far" and "Never Too Far," brings a happy ending for Blaire and Rush.
books.name: FOREVER TOO FAR

books.author: by Carl Hiaasen
books.description: A defrocked Miami cop turned restaurant inspector investigates a grisly murder.
books.name: BAD MONKEY

books.author: by George R.R. Martin
books.description: In the frozen wastes to the north of Winterfell, sinister and supernatural forces are mustering.
books.name: A GAME OF THRONES

books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: In North Carolina in 1973, a college student working at an amusement park confronts the legacy of a vicious murder, the fate of a dying child, and the ways both will change his life forever.
books.name: JOYLAND

books.author: by Jeannette Walls
books.description: When their irresponsible mother takes off, a 12-year-old California girl and her sister join the rest of their family in Virginia.
books.name: THE SILVER STAR

books.author: by Max Brooks
books.description: An “oral history” of an imagined Zombie War that nearly destroys civilization.
books.name: WORLD WAR Z

books.author: by  J.C. Reed
books.description: In a sequel to "Surrender Your Love," Jett Mayfield wins a second chance with Brooke Stewart by protecting her from a secret from her past.
books.name: CONQUER YOUR LOVE

books.author: by Steve Berry
books.description: The ex-government operative Cotton Malone stumbles upon a C.I.A. operation attempting to call into question the legitimacy of Elizabeth I’s reign and its conquest of Ireland.
books.name: THE KING'S DECEPTION

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: The government hitman Will Robie uncovers a serious threat as he attempts to take out a fellow assassin who has gone rogue.
books.name: THE HIT

books.author: by Dorothea Benton Frank
books.description: An Atlanta woman returns to her hometown, Charleston, to reassess her life.
books.name: THE LAST ORIGINAL WIFE

books.author: by Lauren Weisberger
books.description: Andrea Sachs is now running a bridal magazine.
books.name: REVENGE WEARS PRADA

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman disappears on the day of her fifth anniversary; is her husband a killer?
books.name: GONE GIRL
